Subjects: prayers, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, prayers to

Ghent317.Transcription:
Quen of hewyn for theAlle saftys honur theHe ros als he sayd
                    theTeres be for hus we bid the
Ghent317.Note:
Follows 5367; this is verso of last folio in unbound quire,
                    worn and dirty esp. at outer (left) edge.
